mapper.insert: insert into api_beadhouseperson( id,audit_state, name,gender, idcard_no,phone, self_care,household, buildup_area,is_poor, town,village_name, created_on,deleted, etl_time )values ( #{id},#{auditState}, #{name},#{gender}, #{idcardNo},#{phone}, #{selfCare},#{household}, #{buildupArea},#{isPoor}, #{town},#{villageName}, #{createdOn},#{deleted}, #{etlTime} )
